title: Storck Aernario.3 Disc ultralight carbon limited signature edition road bike adds disc brakes!
content:
On top of recent new Aerfast & Fascenario aero road bikes, Storck now updates an ultralight Aernario.3 Disc Signature all-rounder road bike in a super limited edition. The big story though, is that this appears to be the first-ever ultralight Aernario to get disc brakes. And its frame seems to be just as light as

The post Storck Aernario.3 Disc ultralight carbon limited signature edition road bike adds disc brakes! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
